problems.title: Recursive Power Calculation
problems.description:
Write a recursive function to calculate x raised to the power n (x^n). Assume x and n are integers.

Input Format:
Two space-separated integers x and n.

Output Format:
Print the value of x^n.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
2 3

Sample Output
8

Sample Input
5 0

Sample Output
1
hintsList: Think about the base case and the recursive step.
